analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1043-1069):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaisedTotal)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1056-1058)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1060-1064)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaisedTotal)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1056-1058)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1060-1064)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1043-1069) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1043-1069) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#562-577):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#575-576)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#577)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#410-461):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#418-431)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#432-436)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#453-455)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#452-453)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1100-1126) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#1122-1123)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#46-57) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#92-95) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#380-381)

	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#398)

	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#392)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#410-461):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#418-431)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#432-436)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#443-446)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#440-441)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#448-449)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#476-497):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#481-482)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#488-489)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#489-491)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#487-488)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#487)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#696-726) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#712-726)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#710-726)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#225-226)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x97ee19d8c8b2d607af236d8beddf9f45aca99585.sol#252-253)
